title: Our Monogamous Follow Heart
itunes:title: Our Monogamous Follow Heart
author: podcasting@panic.com (Panic)
description: An act of social media spite, an unlikely friendship, and a lot of fast food coupons. How did signing up for a Twitter account to do support lead to an odd and endearing relationship… and whatever happened to the cardboard friends we made along the way?
content:encoded:
An act of social media spite, an unlikely friendship, and a lot of fast food coupons. How did signing up for a Twitter account to do support lead to an odd and endearing relationship… and whatever happened to the cardboard friends we made along the way?

Show Notes

  • Panic’s Twitter
  • Carl’s Jr.'s Twitter
  • Donold Duck’s Twitter
  • Eat the Ball
  • Burnside, our tweet-to-email gateway
  • A Twitter thread about the chef checks
itunes:author: Panic
itunes:subtitle: Whatever happened to the cardboard friends we made along the way?
